title: get today's covid19 data
text: can get today’s world covid19 data use library

title: get today's covid19 data
text: can get get_data() function get today’s covid19 data ’s 2 option data country: country data consist country’s covid19 stat continent: can see covid19 data continent want extract data use language Tools, can extract csv & excel file use get_data_excel() & get_data_csv()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Choe J (2023). covid19today: get today's world covid19 data. R package version 1.0.0.9000, https://sorrychoe.github.io/covid19today/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {covid19today: get today's world covid19 data},   author = {Jaeseong Choe},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 1.0.0.9000},   url = {https://sorrychoe.github.io/covid19today/}, }

title: get today's world covid19 data
text: covid19today library extracts today’s covid-19 data world.

title: get today's world covid19 data
text: want use languages & tools, can extract data csv excel file.
code: data <- get_data(country)  # country: covid-19 data by country # continent: covid-19 data by continent get_data_excel(country) # get .xlsx file  get_data_csv(continent) # get .csv file

title: get today's world covid19 data
text: encounter clear bug, please file issue minimal reproducible example GitHub.

what: covid19today: Get today's world covid19 data — covid19today
title: covid19today: Get today's world covid19 data — covid19today
text: covid19today library extracts today’s covid-19 data world.

title: get_data() — get_data
text: scraping information today's covid19 seperate continent, country total data

title: get_data() — get_data
code: data < -get_data("country") #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Joining with `by = join_by(Country, Continent, TotalCases, NewCases, #> TotalDeaths, NewDeaths, TotalRecovered, NewRecovered, ActiveCases, Critical, #> `Tot Cases/1M pop`, `Deaths/1M pop`, TotalTests, `Tests/1M pop`, Population)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Country, Continent, TotalCases, NewCases, #> TotalDeaths, NewDeaths, TotalRecovered, NewRecovered, ActiveCases, Critical, #> `Tot Cases/1M pop`, `Deaths/1M pop`, TotalTests, `Tests/1M pop`, Population)` #> Error in FUN(left): invalid argument to unary operator summary(data) #> Error in object[[i]]: object of type 'closure' is not subsettable

title: get_data_csv() — get_data_csv
text: scraping information today's covid19 return csv file

title: get_data_csv() — get_data_csv
code: get_data_csv("continent") #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Joining with `by = join_by(Country, Continent, TotalCases, NewCases, #> TotalDeaths, NewDeaths, TotalRecovered, NewRecovered, ActiveCases, Critical, #> `Tot Cases/1M pop`, `Deaths/1M pop`, TotalTests, `Tests/1M pop`, Population)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Country, Continent, TotalCases, NewCases, #> TotalDeaths, NewDeaths, TotalRecovered, NewRecovered, ActiveCases, Critical, #> `Tot Cases/1M pop`, `Deaths/1M pop`, TotalTests, `Tests/1M pop`, Population)`

title: get_data_excel() — get_data_excel
text: scraping information today's covid19 return xlsx file

title: get_data_excel() — get_data_excel
code: get_data_excel("continent") #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Warning: NAs introduced by coercion #> Joining with `by = join_by(Country, Continent, TotalCases, NewCases, #> TotalDeaths, NewDeaths, TotalRecovered, NewRecovered, ActiveCases, Critical, #> `Tot Cases/1M pop`, `Deaths/1M pop`, TotalTests, `Tests/1M pop`, Population)` #> Joining with `by = join_by(Country, Continent, TotalCases, NewCases, #> TotalDeaths, NewDeaths, TotalRecovered, NewRecovered, ActiveCases, Critical, #> `Tot Cases/1M pop`, `Deaths/1M pop`, TotalTests, `Tests/1M pop`, Population)`
